name: ecobalyse-data
description: Accélérer l'affichage environnemental de la filière textile française
author: Ecobalyse <contact@beta.gouv.fr>

scripts.db:validate:all: PYTHONPATH=. uv run check-jsonschema --schemafile tests/processes-schema.json public/data/processes*.json
scripts.export:all: PYTHONPATH=. uv run python ./bin/export.py processes && uv run python ./bin/export.py metadata
scripts.export:food: PYTHONPATH=. uv run python ./bin/export.py processes --scopes food --merge && uv run python ./bin/export.py metadata --scopes food
scripts.export:object: PYTHONPATH=. uv run python ./bin/export.py processes --scopes object --merge
scripts.export:veli: PYTHONPATH=. uv run python ./bin/export.py processes --scopes veli --merge
scripts.export:textile: PYTHONPATH=. uv run python ./bin/export.py processes --scopes textile --merge && uv run python ./bin/export.py metadata --scopes textile
scripts.fix:ruff:all: npm run fix:ruff:check && npm run fix:ruff:format
scripts.fix:all: npm run fix:ruff:all && npm run fix:json:all
scripts.import:all: PYTHONPATH=. npm run import:food && npm run import:ecoinvent && npm run import:method && npm run import:create_activities && npm run import:sync_datapackages
scripts.lint:ruff:all: npm run lint:ruff:check && npm run lint:ruff:format
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:json:all && npm run lint:ruff:all
